title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Empathetic Listening Skills Training for Postpartum Nursing Staff

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Knowledge and Understanding of Postpartum Symptoms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can describe three primary factors influencing the psychological state of postpartum women.
Learners can practice empathetic listening techniques (reflective listening, open-ended questioning, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
The Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale (EPDS) can be used to assess the patient's emotional state
Design and present three communication strategies applicable to patients with postpartum depression
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
